## Setup

```{r setup}
library("tidyverse")
murders <- read_csv("data/murder_total_deaths.csv")
happiness <- read_csv("data/hapiscore_whr.csv")
```

## Data Cleaning

Converting Murder Counts to observations
```{r}

murders_clean <- murders
  



```

```{r}
population_clean <- population |>
  select("country", "1905":"2019") |>
  pivot_longer(cols = "1905":"2019",
               names_to = "Year",
               values_to = "Population") |>
  filter(country != "Holy See") |>
  mutate(Population = case_when(
    str_detect(Population, "M") ~ as.numeric(str_replace_all(Population, "M", "")) * 1000000,
    str_detect(Population, "k") ~ as.numeric(str_replace_all(Population, "k", "")) * 1000,
    TRUE ~ as.numeric(Population)
  ))

population_clean
```
